issue.title: [Rust] [Ballista] Make CI build work with snmalloc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12331](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12331). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ballista was added to CI in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9979> but is building without default features due to snmalloc requiring cmake.

An alternative approach would be to build with cc instead of cmake. See the above PR for conversation about this.
